status.description:
docker enterprise host blueprint
devicemapper storage driver configured with two additional disk
ability to select docker engine version

action_list.description: System action for creating an application

attrs.script:
sudo yum install -y yum-utils
echo "https://storebits.docker.com/ee/linux/@@{DOCKER_KEY}@@/centos/" | sudo tee /etc/yum/vars/dockerurl
sudo yum-config-manager --add-repo https://storebits.docker.com/ee/linux/@@{DOCKER_KEY}@@/centos/docker-ee.repo
sudo yum-config-manager --disable docker-ee-*
sudo yum-config-manager --enable @@{DOCKER_VERSION}@@
sudo yum makecache fast
sudo yum -y install docker-ee
sudo usermod -aG docker centos

sudo pvcreate /dev/sdb /dev/sdc
sudo vgcreate docker /dev/sdb /dev/sdc

sudo lvcreate --wipesignatures y -n thinpool docker -l 95%VG -i2
sudo lvcreate --wipesignatures y -n thinpoolmeta docker -l 1%VG -i2
sudo lvconvert -y --zero n -c 512K --thinpool docker/thinpool --poolmetadata docker/thinpoolmeta

sudo tee /etc/lvm/profile/docker-thinpool.profile <<EOF
activation {
  thin_pool_autoextend_threshold=80
  thin_pool_autoextend_percent=20
}
EOF

sudo lvchange --metadataprofile docker-thinpool docker/thinpool
sudo lvs -o+seg_monitor

sudo mkdir /etc/docker
sudo tee /etc/docker/daemon.json <<EOF
{
  "storage-driver": "devicemapper",
  "storage-opts": [
  	"dm.thinpooldev=/dev/mapper/docker-thinpool",
    "dm.use_deferred_removal=true",
    "dm.use_deferred_deletion=true"
  ]
}
EOF

sudo systemctl start docker
sudo systemctl enable docker

action_list.name: action_create

action_list.description: System action for deleting an application. Deletes physical machines as well
action_list.name: action_delete

action_list.description: System action for starting an application
action_list.name: action_start

action_list.description: System action for stopping an application
action_list.name: action_stop

action_list.description: System action for restarting an application
action_list.name: action_restart

action_list.description: System action for deleting an application. Does not delete physical machines
action_list.name: action_soft_delete

action_list.description: System action for creating an application

cloud_init.user_data:
#cloud-config
users:
  - name: centos
    ssh-authorized-keys:
      - @@{INSTANCE_PUBLIC_KEY}@@
    sudo: ['ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL']

action_list.name: action_suspend

action_list.description: System action for modifying an application
action_list.name: action_modify

action_list.description: System action for powering off an application
action_list.name: action_poweroff

action_list.description: System action for deleting an application. Deletes physical machines as well
action_list.name: action_delete

action_list.description: System action for deleting an application. Does not delete physical machines
action_list.name: action_soft_delete

cloud_init.user_data:
#cloud-config
users:
  - name: centos
    ssh-authorized-keys:
      - @@{INSTANCE_PUBLIC_KEY}@@
    sudo: ['ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL']

attrs.script:
sudo yum install -y iscsi-initiator-utils
sudo systemd-tmpfiles --create
echo "InitiatorName=iqn.1994-05.com.nutanix:k8s-worker" | sudo tee /etc/iscsi/initiatorname.iscsi
sudo systemctl start iscsid
sudo systemctl enable iscsid

sudo yum install -y iscsi-initiator-utils
sudo systemd-tmpfiles --create
sudo systemctl start iscsid
sudo systemctl enable iscsid

docker plugin install --grant-all-permissions @@{dvp_ver}@@ PRISM_IP="@@{PRISM_IP}@@" DATASERVICES_IP="@@{DATA_IP}@@" PRISM_USERNAME="admin" PRISM_PASSWORD="@@{PRISM_PASS}@@"  DEFAULT_CONTAINER="@@{CONTAINER}@@" --alias nutanix

action_list.description: System action for installing an application

attrs.script:
sudo hostnamectl set-hostname "@@{name}@@"
sudo yum install -y lvm2
